cells

Class TrapCell

  • java.lang.Object
    • cells.NormalCell
      • cells.TrapCell
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cell

    public class TrapCell
extends NormalCell
    Class which defines the TrapCell of the game, when a player is in a TrapCell, he is stuck in it until another player reaches this cell.
    Author:
    ostrowst

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class cells.NormalCell

        index, p

    • Constructor Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean canBeLeftNow()
      Indicates if a player occupying this cell can, at this turn, leave the cell.
      boolean isRetaining()
      Indicates if a cell holds a player until another player reaches the same cell.

    • Method Detail

      • canBeLeftNow

        public boolean canBeLeftNow()
        Indicates if a player occupying this cell can, at this turn, leave the cell.
        Specified by:
        canBeLeftNow in interface Cell
        Overrides:
        canBeLeftNow in class NormalCell
        Returns:
        true if and only if the player in the cell can freely leaves the cell at this turn.

      • isRetaining

        public boolean isRetaining()
        Indicates if a cell holds a player until another player reaches the same cell.
        Specified by:
        isRetaining in interface Cell
        Overrides:
        isRetaining in class NormalCell
        Returns:
        true if and only if the only way for a player to get out of this cell is for another player to replace him.
